mapper.insert: insert into ecs_ecsmart_payment (pay_id, pay_code, pay_name, pay_fee, pay_order, enabled, is_cod, is_online, pay_desc, pay_config) values (#{payId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{payCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payOrder,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isCod,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isOnline,jdbcType=BIT}, #{payDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{payConfig,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ecs_ecsmart_payment set pay_code = #{payCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_name = #{payName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_fee = #{payFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_order = #{payOrder,jdbcType=TINYINT}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, is_cod = #{isCod,jdbcType=BIT}, is_online = #{isOnline,jdbcType=BIT}, pay_desc = #{payDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, pay_config = #{payConfig,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where pay_id = #{payId,jdbcType=TINYINT}
mapper.select: select pay_id, pay_code, pay_name, pay_fee, pay_order, enabled, is_cod, is_online, pay_desc, pay_config from ecs_ecsmart_payment where pay_id = #{payId,jdbcType=TINYINT}
